messages.content: It's a Conservative Majority or a Hung Parliament. John Curtice: Polls teeter between hung parliament and slim Tory majority. At the end of this election, we'll either get a Conservative majority — or a hung parliament. The Lib Dems have ruled out a coalition with the Conservatives. So a hung parliament means Jeremy Corbyn as Prime Minister. Jo Swinson says no to second Tory alliance. Corbyn would have to be propped up by the Scottish Nationalists. Don't risk five long years of Corbyn in charge.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A track record of increasing funding for every pupil in every school, with more to come... and new schools planned.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: REVITALISE AND REGENERATE OUR RETAIL CENTRES
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Prioritising brownfield redevelopment to improve local communities and protect our countryside.
Working hard to improve services, reliability, and capacity on the railway.
Boosting investment in fixing our roads locally... and taking bold investment decisions across our country.
Supporting our local area with hundreds of extra police officers here in Hampshire to cut crime locally... and improving air quality by cutting emissions.
Getting on with cutting local GP waiting times, and building a new hospital in north Hampshire.

quotes.text: Polls teeter between hung parliament and slim Tory majority
Jo Swinson says no to second Tory alliance
SNP to back Labour government only with Scottish independence vote

examples: Polls teeter between hung parliament and slim Tory majority
SUPERB EDUCATION FOR ALL... Increasing funding for every pupil in every school, with more to come... and new schools planned.
REVITALISE AND REGENERATE OUR RETAIL CENTRES... Prioritising brownfield redevelopment to improve local communities and protect our countryside.
GREENER, CLEANER, SAFER... Supporting our local area with hundreds of extra police officers here in Hampshire to cut crime locally.
Don't risk five long years of Corbyn in charge.
SUPERB EDUCATION FOR ALL... Increasing funding for every pupil in every school, with more to come... and new schools planned.
REVITALISE AND REGENERATE OUR RETAIL CENTRES... Prioritising brownfield redevelopment to improve local communities and protect our countryside.
FASTER, LONGER, BETTER TRAINS... Working hard to improve services, reliability, and capacity on the railway.
BETTER ROADS FOR EVERYONE... Boosting investment in fixing our roads locally... and taking bold investment decisions across our country.
GREENER, CLEANER, SAFER... Supporting our local area with hundreds of extra police officers here in Hampshire to cut crime locally.
£33.9BN EXTRA FOR THE NHS... Getting on with cutting local GP waiting times, and building a new hospital in north Hampshire.
Don't risk five long years of Corbyn in charge.
At the end of this election, we'll either get a Conservative majority — or a hung parliament.
The Lib Dems have ruled out a coalition with the Conservatives. So a hung parliament means Jeremy Corbyn as Prime Minister.
Corbyn would have to be propped up by the Scottish Nationalists. They're demanding another referendum to break up Britain.
Don't risk five long years of Corbyn in charge.
